name: Bubble Bounce on
description:
Application Profile:
Very delicate and lovely casual & athletic Bubble Bobble game, taking you through the vastness of space, enjoy the unique beauty of each planet.

Game Introduction:
Tap the screen to launch bubbles, through three or three more of the same color are connected to eliminate bubbles.

Game modes:
◆ checkpoints Mode: 12 Planet scenes, 120 various characteristics of checkpoints, unique BOSS battle waiting for your challenge.
◆ Battle Mode: The most professional sports Versus mode, the most exciting man-machine war. Bluetooth & online play is about to open.
◆ infinite modes: Challenge scores limit, a look at it together Competition
